layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x76
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x76
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x60
      LayoutBlockFlow (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 196x18
          text run at (0,0) width 196: "the text should be courier 24pt"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,18) size 83x24
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 83x24
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 83x20

                text run at (1,1) width 77: "inside a cell"
